attributes.action: bring into law changes to reduce the dominant role of the unaccountable legal profession within the civil justice system; objectives stated on the website of the recently formed 'National Union of Pensioners'.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Ordinary citizens seeking justice are being denied access to the civil justice system by judges, lawyers and solicitors refusing to help or represent them. 'Striking out' the writs of Litigants-in-Person without valid reason or justification.
